title: Pelosi Wants Government to Negotiate Prices of Costliest Drugs
text:
WASHINGTON—House Speaker Nancy Pelosi is calling for the federal government to negotiate prices for many of the most costly drugs in Medicare and the private market, part of a broad proposal to take on an industry already under siege from Republicans who have vowed to rein in pharmaceutical costs.

The California Democrat released a proposal Thursday that would let the government negotiate the prices for expensive drugs that don’t have competition. A minimum of 25 drugs annually would be subject to negotiation, falling short...
